医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
第一项报告从医疗设备中分离出萨斯喀彻温分枝杆菌的研究研究人员报告了首次从医疗级设备中分离出萨斯喀彻温分枝杆菌。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231212/First-study-to-report-isolation-of-M-saskatchewanense-from-medical-devices.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231212/First-study-to-report-isolation-of-M-saskatchewanense-from-medical-devices.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=2e6c2ea2-2e5e-4d31-8f6d-c0ac4bd06732 Tue, 12 Dec 2023 05:14:00 -0500 First study to report isolation of M. saskatchewanense from medical devices
解决健康不平等问题：REP-EQUITY 工具包旨在实现更公平的研究代表性研究人员创建了 REP-EQUITY 工具箱，用于为健康研究获取公平且具有代表性的样本。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231212/Addressing-health-inequalities-REP-EQUITY-toolkit-aims-for-fairer-research-representation.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231212/Addressing-health-inequalities-REP-EQUITY-toolkit-aims-for-fairer-research-representation.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=71fbf6e8-6d8e-4078-bb15-131be2ea4064 Tue, 12 Dec 2023 04:11:00 -0500 Addressing health inequalities: REP-EQUITY toolkit aims for fairer research representation
彻底改变糖尿病护理：tPBM 疗法被证明可有效恢复小胶质细胞健康经颅光生物调节（tPBM）治疗影响胰岛素治疗对小胶质细胞功能的影响。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231212/Revolutionizing-diabetes-care-tPBM-therapy-proves- effective-in-restoring-microglial-health.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231212/Revolutionizing-diabetes-care-tPBM-therapy-proves- effective-in-restoring-microglial-health.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=eb5aacf6-1937-44ff-89dd-9afa8cf6586f Tue, 12 Dec 2023 04:10:00 -0500 Revolutionizing diabetes care: tPBM therapy proves effective in restoring microglial health
新的联合治疗为老年套细胞淋巴瘤患者带来希望2 期试验 PrE0405 达到了主要终点，33 名 60 岁以上套细胞淋巴瘤 (MCL) 患者接受了苯达莫司汀和利妥昔单抗（一种标准化疗免疫疗法）治疗，获得了 85% 的完全缓解 (CR) 率。与venetoclax一起，这是在这种情况下的研究。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231211/New-combination-treatment-offers-hope-for-older-病人-with-mantle-cell-lymphoma.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231211/New-combination-treatment-offers-hope-for-older-病人-with-mantle-cell-lymphoma.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=2e1bf3f4-98e5-4560-b026-a2376c95abb3 Mon, 11 Dec 2023 23:33:53 -0500 New combination treatment offers hope for older patients with mantle cell lymphoma
健康益处和天然成分是推广甜味蛋白质替代糖的关键研究发现，在促进甜味蛋白作为糖替代品的消费方面，以健康为中心的信息比自然框架更有效，这对旨在减少糖摄入量的公共卫生策略具有影响。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231211/Health-benefits-and-natural-ingredients-key-to-promoting-sweet- Protein-alternatives-over-sugar.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231211/Health-benefits-and-natural-ingredients-key-to-promoting-sweet- Protein-alternatives-over-sugar.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=da6ced9e-2b47-4b78-a411-496ae0628189 Mon, 11 Dec 2023 23:31:00 -0500 Health benefits and natural ingredients key to promoting sweet protein alternatives over sugar
研究确定了早产儿肺和眼损伤的关键因素早产儿护理的进步正在提高存活率。然而，支气管肺发育不良（BPD）和早产儿视网膜病变（ROP）等具有终生后果的新生儿疾病的发病率正在增加。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231211/Study-identizes-key-factor-in-lung-and-eye-damage-in-preemies.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231211/Study-identizes-key-factor-in-lung-and-eye-damage-in-preemies.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=905a707b-1aa6-41bf-a6c7-6b78a5337818 Mon, 11 Dec 2023 23:24:07 -0500 Study identifies key factor in lung and eye damage in preemies
研究发现咖啡和咖啡因促进新陈代谢并提高运动表现研究表明，咖啡和咖啡因可增强新陈代谢和运动表现，对心率、能量消耗、减脂和胰岛素敏感性产生不同的影响，对运动员和整体健康产生影响。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231211/Coffee-and-caffeine-boost-metabolism-and-enhance-exercise-performance-study-finds.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231211/Coffee-and-caffeine-boost-metabolism-and-enhance-exercise-performance-study-finds.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=30e55ce0-7336-403f-b57f-a4bd2a61085b Mon, 11 Dec 2023 23:15:00 -0500 Coffee and caffeine boost metabolism and enhance exercise performance, study finds
危机中的新鲜食品：妇女团体如何在封锁期间传递希望和蔬菜2020 年 3 月，印度政府在提前四小时通知的情况下宣布实行严格封锁，其中包括禁止 80% 至 90% 的印度人主要食物来源所依赖的非正式和传统食品店。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231211/Fresh-food-in-a-crisis-How-womens-groups-delivered-hope-and-vegetables-during-lockdown.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231211/Fresh-food-in-a-crisis-How-womens-groups-delivered-hope-and-vegetables-during-lockdown.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=af16cc79-15c0-4a1c-8de9-9a4fadce06d9 Mon, 11 Dec 2023 23:09:58 -0500 Fresh food in a crisis: How women's groups delivered hope and vegetables during lockdown
SURMOUNT-4 试验中替泽帕肽维持体重减轻并改善心脏代谢健康事实证明，目前的抗肥胖药物对于消除多余的体重非常有效。然而，由威尔康奈尔医学院和纽约长老会医院的研究人员领导的一项三期随机临床试验发现，停止服用该药物的人在一年内恢复了大部分体重。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231211/Tirzepatide-maintains-weight-loss-and-improves-cardiometabolic-health-in-SURMOUNT-4-Trial.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231211/Tirzepatide-maintains-weight-loss-and-improves-cardiometabolic-health-in-SURMOUNT-4-Trial.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=807f2390-5abb-4d58-b33b-7625ec578d84 Mon, 11 Dec 2023 22:14:00 -0500 Tirzepatide maintains weight loss and improves cardiometabolic health in SURMOUNT-4 trial
合生元配方有望减少长期新冠症状研究发现，合生制剂 SIM01 可显着减轻患者的急性 COVID-19 综合征症状，包括疲劳、记忆问题和胃肠道不适，表明其作为长期 COVID 治疗的潜力。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231211/Synbiotic-formula-shows-promise-in-reducing-long-COVID-symptoms.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231211/Synbiotic-formula-shows-promise-in-reducing-long-COVID-symptoms.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=abdcc9b5-6c5c-4d76-a1d5-5c331f99b226 Mon, 11 Dec 2023 22:12:00 -0500 Synbiotic formula shows promise in reducing long COVID symptoms
